name: RTMStencil
categories: Toolkit/IntelÂ® oneAPI Base Toolkit/oneAPI DPC++ Compiler/CPU and GPU
description: Stencil computation is the basis for the Reverse Time Migration algorithm in seismic computing. The underlying mathematical problem is to solve the wave equation using finite difference method. This sample computes a 3D 25 points stencil. The computation contains 4 layer loops for each dimention and time duration.
